name: Lyla's Café [Jam Edition]
description:
Welcome to Lyla's Café! Make drinks and try to please every customer in just a day.

* Earphone warning when the Karen comes in *

[Note for Goodgis at the bottom]

Controls:

Staff Area:

  • Book --> Open crafting
  • Radio --> Start day
  • Red Plus Button --> Add a drink to your menu

Crafting:

  • Green Button --> Add ingredient
  • Blue button --> Brew drink
  • Ingredients --> Click them to remove them
  • Book --> Back to staff area

Cafe Scene:

  • Customers --> Click to start talking
  • Drinks --> Click to server (only one per customer)
